rooms.name: Home
rooms.description:
You just finished your Demon Slayer Corps Test, so you are now an official member. 
Your mission is to practice your skills and kill the demons.

rooms.name: Practice
rooms.description: You arrive at the practicing center. You feel like you are becoming more and more powerful.

rooms.name: Vacation
rooms.description: You arrive at a Onsen in Tokyo. You have a lot of fun with your friend Tanjiro.

rooms.name: Preparation
rooms.description: Leading by Tengen Uzui, you and Tanjiro arrive at Yoshihara. Tengen went unconcious.

rooms.name: Fighting
rooms.description: Your knife broke. Tanjiro was seriously injured so he couldn't move anymore.

rooms.name: Win
rooms.description:
Tanjiro poisons the demon and gives you the chance to cut it on neck.
 You successfully defeat the demon

rooms.name: Lose
rooms.description: Kochou Shinobu comes. She defeats the demon but is angry at you.
